content:
Hellu all. I will have to temporarily leave this group's activities, because... life. Life and mental health, mostly. Things have gotten harder here, and a recent event just took my plate and threw it entirely off the table.

Thank you for giving me a space to participate. I look forward to having a meeting with y'all again in the future someday. Take care :tulip:
Best wishes @Félix Fischer! It was a pleasure working with you on the mir-opt stuff and I hope to see you again in the future :smile:
